00055 command_t lnet_cmds[] = {
00056         {"configure", jt_config_lnet, 0, "configure lnet\n"
00057          "\t--all: load NI configuration from module parameters\n"},
00058         {"unconfigure", jt_unconfig_lnet, 0, "unconfigure lnet\n"},
00059         { 0, 0, 0, NULL }

00062 command_t route_cmds[] = {
00063         {"add", jt_add_route, 0, "add a route\n"
00064          "\t--net: net name (e.g. tcp0)\n"
00065          "\t--gateway: gateway nid (e.g. 10.1.1.2@tcp)\n"
00066          "\t--hop: number to final destination (1 < hops < 255)\n"
00067          "\t--priority: priority of route (0 - highest prio\n"},
00068         {"del", jt_del_route, 0, "delete a route\n"
00069          "\t--net: net name (e.g. tcp0)\n"
00070          "\t--gateway: gateway nid (e.g. 10.1.1.2@tcp)\n"},
00071         {"show", jt_show_route, 0, "show routes\n"
00072          "\t--net: net name (e.g. tcp0) to filter on\n"
00073          "\t--gateway: gateway nid (e.g. 10.1.1.2@tcp) to filter on\n"
00074          "\t--hop: number to final destination (1 < hops < 255) to filter on\n"
00075          "\t--priority: priority of route (0 - highest prio to filter on\n"
00076          "\t--verbose: display detailed output per route\n"},
00077         { 0, 0, 0, NULL }
00078 };

00080 command_t net_cmds[] = {
00081         {"add", jt_add_net, 0, "add a network\n"
00082          "\t--net: net name (e.g. tcp0)\n"
00083          "\t--if: physical interface (e.g. eth0)\n"
00084          "\t--ip2net: specify networks based on IP address patterns\n"
00085          "\t--peer-timeout: time to wait before declaring a peer dead\n"
00086          "\t--peer-credits: define the max number of inflight messages\n"
00087          "\t--peer-buffer-credits: the number of buffer credits per peer\n"
00088          "\t--credits: Network Interface credits\n"
00089          "\t--cpt: CPU Partitions configured net uses (e.g. [0,1]\n"},
00090         {"del", jt_del_net, 0, "delete a network\n"
00091          "\t--net: net name (e.g. tcp0)\n"},

00093          "\t--net: net name (e.g. tcp0) to filter on\n"

00095         { 0, 0, 0, NULL }

00113 command_t set_cmds[] = {
00114         {"tiny_buffers", jt_set_tiny, 0, "set tiny routing buffers\n"
00115          "\tVALUE must be greater than 0\n"},
00116         {"small_buffers", jt_set_small, 0, "set small routing buffers\n"
00117          "\tVALUE must be greater than 0\n"},
00118         {"large_buffers", jt_set_large, 0, "set large routing buffers\n"
00119          "\tVALUE must be greater than 0\n"},
00120         {"routing", jt_set_routing, 0, "enable/disable routing\n"
00121          "\t0 - disable routing\n"
00122          "\t1 - enable routing\n"},
00123         { 0, 0, 0, NULL }

00125 
00126 static inline void print_help(const command_t cmds[], const char *cmd_type,
00127                               const char *pc_name)
00128 {
00129         const command_t *cmd;
00130 
00131         for (cmd = cmds; cmd->pc_name; cmd++) {
00132                 if (pc_name != NULL &&
00133                     strcmp(cmd->pc_name, pc_name) == 0) {
00134                         printf("%s %s: %s\n", cmd_type, cmd->pc_name,
00135                                cmd->pc_help);
00136                         return;
00137                 } else if (pc_name != NULL) {
00138                         continue;
00139                 }
00140                 printf("%s %s: %s\n", cmd_type, cmd->pc_name, cmd->pc_help);
00141         }
00142 }
00143 
00144 static int parse_long(const char *number, long int *value)
00145 {
00146         char *end;
00147 
00148         *value = strtol(number,  &end, 0);
00149         if (end != NULL && *end != 0)
00150                 return -1;
00151 
00152         return 0;
00153 }
00154 
00155 static int handle_help(const command_t *cmd_list, const char *cmd,
00156                        const char *sub_cmd, int argc, char **argv)
00157 {
00158         int opt;
00159         int rc = -1;
00160         optind = 0;
00161         opterr = 0;
00162 
00163         const char *const short_options = "h";
00164         const struct option long_options[] = {
00165                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00166                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00167         };
00168 
00169         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00170                                   long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00171                 switch (opt) {
00172                 case 'h':
00173                         print_help(cmd_list, cmd, sub_cmd);
00174                         rc = 0;
00175                         break;
00176                 default:
00177                         rc = -1;
00178                         break;
00179                 }
00180         }
00181 
00182         opterr = 1;
00183         optind = 0;
00184         return rc;
00185 }
00186 
00187 static int jt_set_tiny(int argc, char **argv)
00188 {
00189         long int value;
00190         int rc;
00191         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00192 
00193         if (handle_help(set_cmds, "set", "tiny_buffers", argc, argv) == 0)
00194                 return 0;
00195 
00196         rc = parse_long(argv[1], &value);
00197         if (rc != 0) {
00198                 cYAML_build_error(-1, -1, "parser", "set",
00199                                   "cannot parse tiny_buffers value", &err_rc);
00200                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00201                 cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00202                 return -1;
00203         }
00204 
00205         rc = lustre_lnet_config_buffers(value, -1, -1, -1, &err_rc);
00206         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00207                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00208 
00209         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00210 
00211         return rc;
00212 }
00213 
00214 static int jt_set_small(int argc, char **argv)
00215 {
00216         long int value;
00217         int rc;
00218         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00219 
00220         if (handle_help(set_cmds, "set", "small_buffers", argc, argv) == 0)
00221                 return 0;
00222 
00223         rc = parse_long(argv[1], &value);
00224         if (rc != 0) {
00225                 cYAML_build_error(-1, -1, "parser", "set",
00226                                   "cannot parse small_buffers value", &err_rc);
00227                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00228                 cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00229                 return -1;
00230         }
00231 
00232         rc = lustre_lnet_config_buffers(-1, value, -1, -1, &err_rc);
00233         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00234                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00235 
00236         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00237 
00238         return rc;
00239 }

00241 static int jt_set_large(int argc, char **argv)
00242 {
00243         long int value;
00244         int rc;
00245         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00246 
00247         if (handle_help(set_cmds, "set", "large_buffers", argc, argv) == 0)
00248                 return 0;
00249 
00250         rc = parse_long(argv[1], &value);
00251         if (rc != 0) {
00252                 cYAML_build_error(-1, -1, "parser", "set",
00253                                   "cannot parse large_buffers value", &err_rc);
00254                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00255                 cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00256                 return -1;
00257         }
00258 
00259         rc = lustre_lnet_config_buffers(-1, -1, value, -1, &err_rc);
00260         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00261                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00262 
00263         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00264 
00265         return rc;
00266 }
00267 
00268 static int jt_set_routing(int argc, char **argv)
00269 {
00270         long int value;
00271         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00272         int rc;
00273 
00274         if (handle_help(set_cmds, "set", "routing", argc, argv) == 0)
00275                 return 0;
00276 
00277         rc = parse_long(argv[1], &value);
00278         if (rc != 0 || (value != 0 && value != 1)) {
00279                 cYAML_build_error(-1, -1, "parser", "set",
00280                                   "cannot parse routing value.\n"
00281                                   "must be 0 for disable or 1 for enable",
00282                                   &err_rc);
00283                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00284                 cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00285                 return -1;
00286         }
00287 
00288         rc = lustre_lnet_enable_routing(value, -1, &err_rc);
00289 
00290         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00291                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00292 
00293         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00294 
00295         return rc;
00296 }
00297 
00298 static int jt_config_lnet(int argc, char **argv)
00299 {
00300         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00301         bool load_mod_params = false;
00302         int rc, opt;
00303 
00304         const char *const short_options = "ah";
00305         const struct option long_options[] = {
00306                 { "all", 0, NULL, 'a' },
00307                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00308                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00309         };
00310 
00311         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00312                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00313                 switch (opt) {
00314                 case 'a':
00315                         load_mod_params = true;
00316                         break;
00317                 case 'h':
00318                         print_help(lnet_cmds, "lnet", "configure");
00319                         return 0;
00320                 default:
00321                         return 0;
00322                 }
00323         }
00324 
00325         rc = lustre_lnet_config_ni_system(LNET_CONFIGURE, load_mod_params,
00326                                           -1, &err_rc);
00327 
00328         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00329                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00330 
00331         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00332 
00333         return rc;
00334 }
00335 
00336 static int jt_unconfig_lnet(int argc, char **argv)
00337 {
00338         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00339         int rc;
00340 
00341         if (handle_help(lnet_cmds, "lnet", "unconfigure", argc, argv) == 0)
00342                 return 0;
00343 
00344         rc = lustre_lnet_config_ni_system(LNET_UNCONFIGURE, 0, -1, &err_rc);
00345 
00346         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00347                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00348 
00349         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00350 
00351         return rc;
00352 }
00353 static int jt_add_route(int argc, char **argv)
00354 {
00355         char *network = NULL, *gateway = NULL;
00356         long int hop = -1, prio = -1;
00357         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00358         int rc, opt;
00359 
00360         const char *const short_options = "n:g:c:p:h";
00361         const struct option long_options[] = {
00362                 { "net", 1, NULL, 'n' },
00363                 { "gateway", 1, NULL, 'g' },
00364                 { "hop-count", 1, NULL, 'c' },
00365                 { "priority", 1, NULL, 'p' },
00366                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00367                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00368         };
00369 
00370         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00371                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00372                 switch (opt) {
00373                 case 'n':
00374                         network = optarg;
00375                         break;
00376                 case 'g':
00377                         gateway = optarg;
00378                         break;
00379                 case 'c':
00380                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &hop);
00381                         if (rc != 0) {
00382                                 /* ignore option */
00383                                 hop = -1;
00384                                 continue;
00385                         }
00386                         break;
00387                 case 'p':
00388                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &prio);
00389                         if (rc != 0) {
00390                                 /* ingore option */
00391                                 prio = -1;
00392                                 continue;
00393                         }
00394                         break;
00395                 case 'h':
00396                         print_help(route_cmds, "route", "add");
00397                         return 0;
00398                 default:
00399                         return 0;
00400                 }
00401         }
00402 
00403         rc = lustre_lnet_config_route(network, gateway, hop, prio, -1, &err_rc);
00404 
00405         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00406                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00407 
00408         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00409 
00410         return rc;
00411 }
00412 
00413 static int jt_add_net(int argc, char **argv)
00414 {
00415         char *network = NULL, *intf = NULL, *ip2net = NULL, *cpt = NULL;
00416         long int pto = -1, pc = -1, pbc = -1, cre = -1;
00417         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00418         int rc, opt;
00419 
00420         const char *const short_options = "n:i:p:t:c:b:r:s:h";
00421         const struct option long_options[] = {
00422                 { "net", 1, NULL, 'n' },
00423                 { "if", 1, NULL, 'i' },
00424                 { "ip2net", 1, NULL, 'p' },
00425                 { "peer-timeout", 1, NULL, 't' },
00426                 { "peer-credits", 1, NULL, 'c' },
00427                 { "peer-buffer-credits", 1, NULL, 'b' },
00428                 { "credits", 1, NULL, 'r' },
00429                 { "cpt", 1, NULL, 's' },
00430                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00431                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00432         };
00433 
00434         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00435                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00436                 switch (opt) {
00437                 case 'n':
00438                         network = optarg;
00439                         break;
00440                 case 'i':
00441                         intf = optarg;
00442                         break;
00443                 case 'p':
00444                         ip2net = optarg;
00445                         break;
00446                 case 't':
00447                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &pto);
00448                         if (rc != 0) {
00449                                 /* ignore option */
00450                                 pto = -1;
00451                                 continue;
00452                         }
00453                         break;
00454                 case 'c':
00455                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &pc);
00456                         if (rc != 0) {
00457                                 /* ignore option */
00458                                 pc = -1;
00459                                 continue;
00460                         }
00461                         break;
00462                 case 'b':
00463                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &pbc);
00464                         if (rc != 0) {
00465                                 /* ignore option */
00466                                 pbc = -1;
00467                                 continue;
00468                         }
00469                         break;
00470                 case 'r':
00471                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &cre);
00472                         if (rc != 0) {
00473                                 /* ignore option */
00474                                 cre = -1;
00475                                 continue;
00476                         }
00477                         break;
00478                 case 's':
00479                         cpt = optarg;
00480                         break;
00481                 case 'h':
00482                         print_help(net_cmds, "net", "add");
00483                         return 0;
00484                 default:
00485                         return 0;
00486                 }
00487         }
00488 
00489         rc = lustre_lnet_config_net(network, intf, ip2net, pto, pc, pbc,
00490                                     cre, cpt, -1, NULL, &err_rc);
00491 
00492         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00493                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00494 
00495         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00496 
00497         return rc;
00498 }
00499 
00500 static int jt_del_route(int argc, char **argv)
00501 {
00502         char *network = NULL, *gateway = NULL;
00503         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00504         int rc, opt;
00505 
00506         const char *const short_options = "n:g:h";
00507         const struct option long_options[] = {
00508                 { "net", 1, NULL, 'n' },
00509                 { "gateway", 1, NULL, 'g' },
00510                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00511                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00512         };
00513 
00514         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00515                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00516                 switch (opt) {
00517                 case 'n':
00518                         network = optarg;
00519                         break;
00520                 case 'g':
00521                         gateway = optarg;
00522                         break;
00523                 case 'h':
00524                         print_help(route_cmds, "route", "del");
00525                         return 0;
00526                 default:
00527                         return 0;
00528                 }
00529         }
00530 
00531         rc = lustre_lnet_del_route(network, gateway, -1, &err_rc);
00532 
00533         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00534                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00535 
00536         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00537 
00538         return rc;
00539 }

00541 static int jt_del_net(int argc, char **argv)
00542 {
00543         char *network = NULL;
00544         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00545         int rc, opt;
00546 
00547         const char *const short_options = "n:h";
00548         const struct option long_options[] = {
00549                 { "net", 1, NULL, 'n' },
00550                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00551                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00552         };
00553 
00554         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00555                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00556                 switch (opt) {
00557                 case 'n':
00558                         network = optarg;
00559                         break;
00560                 case 'h':
00561                         print_help(net_cmds, "net", "del");
00562                         return 0;
00563                 default:
00564                         return 0;
00565                 }
00566         }
00567 
00568         rc = lustre_lnet_del_net(network, -1, &err_rc);
00569 
00570         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00571                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00572 
00573         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00574 
00575         return rc;
00576 }
00577 
00578 static int jt_show_route(int argc, char **argv)
00579 {
00580         char *network = NULL, *gateway = NULL;
00581         long int hop = -1, prio = -1;
00582         int detail = 0, rc, opt;
00583         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL, *show_rc = NULL;
00584 
00585         const char *const short_options = "n:g:h:p:vh";
00586         const struct option long_options[] = {
00587                 { "net", 1, NULL, 'n' },
00588                 { "gateway", 1, NULL, 'g' },
00589                 { "hop-count", 1, NULL, 'c' },
00590                 { "priority", 1, NULL, 'p' },
00591                 { "verbose", 0, NULL, 'v' },
00592                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00593                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00594         };
00595 
00596         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00597                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00598                 switch (opt) {
00599                 case 'n':
00600                         network = optarg;
00601                         break;
00602                 case 'g':
00603                         gateway = optarg;
00604                         break;
00605                 case 'c':
00606                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &hop);
00607                         if (rc != 0) {
00608                                 /* ignore option */
00609                                 hop = -1;
00610                                 continue;
00611                         }
00612                         break;
00613                 case 'p':
00614                         rc = parse_long(optarg, &prio);
00615                         if (rc != 0) {
00616                                 /* ignore option */
00617                                 prio = -1;
00618                                 continue;
00619                         }
00620                         break;
00621                 case 'v':
00622                         detail = 1;
00623                         break;
00624                 case 'h':
00625                         print_help(route_cmds, "route", "show");
00626                         return 0;
00627                 default:
00628                         return 0;
00629                 }
00630         }
00631 
00632         rc = lustre_lnet_show_route(network, gateway, hop, prio, detail, -1,
00633                                     &show_rc, &err_rc);
00634 
00635         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00636                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00637         else if (show_rc)
00638                 cYAML_print_tree(show_rc);
00639 
00640         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00641         cYAML_free_tree(show_rc);
00642 
00643         return rc;
00644 }
00645 
00646 static int jt_show_net(int argc, char **argv)
00647 {
00648         char *network = NULL;
00649         int detail = 0, rc, opt;
00650         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL, *show_rc = NULL;
00651 
00652         const char *const short_options = "n:vh";
00653         const struct option long_options[] = {
00654                 { "net", 1, NULL, 'n' },
00655                 { "verbose", 0, NULL, 'v' },
00656                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00657                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00658         };
00659 
00660         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00661                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00662                 switch (opt) {
00663                 case 'n':
00664                         network = optarg;
00665                         break;
00666                 case 'v':
00667                         detail = 1;
00668                         break;
00669                 case 'h':
00670                         print_help(net_cmds, "net", "show");
00671                         return 0;
00672                 default:
00673                         return 0;
00674                 }
00675         }
00676 
00677         rc = lustre_lnet_show_net(network, detail, -1, &show_rc, &err_rc);
00678 
00679         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00680                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00681         else if (show_rc)
00682                 cYAML_print_tree(show_rc);
00683 
00684         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00685         cYAML_free_tree(show_rc);
00686 
00687         return rc;
00688 }

00836 
00837 static int jt_import(int argc, char **argv)
00838 {
00839         char *file = NULL;
00840         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00841         struct cYAML *show_rc = NULL;
00842         int rc = 0, opt, opt_found = 0;
00843         char cmd = 'a';
00844 
00845         const char *const short_options = "adsh";
00846         const struct option long_options[] = {
00847                 { "add", 0, NULL, 'a' },
00848                 { "del", 0, NULL, 'd' },
00849                 { "show", 0, NULL, 's' },
00850                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00851                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00852         };
00853 
00854         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00855                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00856                 opt_found = 1;
00857                 switch (opt) {
00858                 case 'a':
00859                 case 'd':
00860                 case 's':
00861                         cmd = opt;
00862                         break;
00863                 case 'h':
00864                         printf("import FILE\n"
00865                                "import < FILE : import a file\n"
00866                                "\t--add: add configuration\n"
00867                                "\t--del: delete configuration\n"
00868                                "\t--show: show configuration\n"
00869                                "\t--help: display this help\n"
00870                                "If no command option is given then --add"
00871                                " is assumed by default\n");
00872                         return 0;
00873                 default:
00874                         return 0;
00875                 }
00876         }
00877 
00878         /* grab the file name if one exists */
00879         if (opt_found && argc == 3)
00880                 file = argv[2];
00881         else if (!opt_found && argc == 2)
00882                 file = argv[1];
00883 
00884         switch (cmd) {
00885         case 'a':
00886                 rc = lustre_yaml_config(file, &err_rc);
00887                 break;
00888         case 'd':
00889                 rc = lustre_yaml_del(file, &err_rc);
00890                 break;
00891         case 's':
00892                 rc = lustre_yaml_show(file, &show_rc, &err_rc);
00893                 cYAML_print_tree(show_rc);
00894                 cYAML_free_tree(show_rc);
00895                 break;
00896         }
00897 
00898         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR)
00899                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00900 
00901         cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00902 
00903         return rc;
00904 }
00905 
00906 static int jt_export(int argc, char **argv)
00907 {
00908         struct cYAML *show_rc = NULL;
00909         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00910         int rc, opt;
00911         FILE *f = NULL;
00912 
00913         const char *const short_options = "h";
00914         const struct option long_options[] = {
00915                 { "help", 0, NULL, 'h' },
00916                 { NULL, 0, NULL, 0 },
00917         };
00918 
00919         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, short_options,
00920                                    long_options, NULL)) != -1) {
00921                 switch (opt) {
00922                 case 'h':
00923                         printf("export FILE\n"
00924                                "export > FILE : export configuration\n"
00925                                "\t--help: display this help\n");
00926                         return 0;
00927                 default:
00928                         return 0;
00929                 }
00930         }
00931 
00932         if (argc >= 2) {
00933                 f = fopen(argv[1], "w");
00934                 if (f == NULL)
00935                         return -1;
00936         } else
00937                 f = stdout;
00938 
00939         rc = lustre_lnet_show_net(NULL, 1, -1, &show_rc, &err_rc);
00940         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR) {
00941                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00942                 cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00943         }
00944 
00945         rc = lustre_lnet_show_route(NULL, NULL, -1, -1, 1, -1, &show_rc,
00946                                     &err_rc);
00947         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR) {
00948                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00949                 cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00950         }
00951 
00952         rc = lustre_lnet_show_routing(-1, &show_rc, &err_rc);
00953         if (rc != LUSTRE_CFG_RC_NO_ERR) {
00954                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00955                 cYAML_free_tree(err_rc);
00956         }
00957 
00958         if (show_rc != NULL) {
00959                 cYAML_print_tree2file(f, show_rc);
00960                 cYAML_free_tree(show_rc);
00961         }
00962 
00963         if (argc >= 2)
00964                 fclose(f);
00965 
00966         return 0;
00967 }
00968 
00969 command_t list[] = {
00970         {"lnet", jt_lnet, 0, "lnet {configure | unconfigure} [--all]"},
00971         {"route", jt_route, 0, "route {add | del | show | help}"},
00972         {"net", jt_net, 0, "net {add | del | show | help}"},
00973         {"routing", jt_routing, 0, "routing {show | help}"},
00974         {"set", jt_set, 0, "set {tiny_buffers | small_buffers | large_buffers"
00975                            " | routing}"},
00976         {"import", jt_import, 0, "import {--add | --del | --show | "
00977                                  "--help} FILE.yaml"},
00978         {"export", jt_export, 0, "export {--help} FILE.yaml"},
00979         {"stats", jt_stats, 0, "stats {show | help}"},
00980         {"peer_credits", jt_peer_credits, 0, "peer_credits {show | help}"},
00981         {"help", Parser_help, 0, "help"},
00982         {"exit", Parser_quit, 0, "quit"},
00983         {"quit", Parser_quit, 0, "quit"},
00984         { 0, 0, 0, NULL }
00985 };
00986 
00987 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00988 {
00989         int rc = 0;
00990         struct cYAML *err_rc = NULL;
00991 
00992         rc = lustre_lnet_config_lib_init();
00993         if (rc < 0) {
00994                 cYAML_build_error(-1, -1, "lnetctl", "startup",
00995                                   "cannot register LNet device", &err_rc);
00996                 cYAML_print_tree2file(stderr, err_rc);
00997                 return rc;
00998         }
00999 
01000         Parser_init("lnetctl > ", list);
01001         if (argc > 1) {
01002                 rc = Parser_execarg(argc - 1, &argv[1], list);
01003                 goto errorout;
01004         }
01005 
01006         Parser_commands();
01007 
01008 errorout:
01009         return rc;
01010 }
